trans-unit.source: Enables in-place updates to existing blocks of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata" />.
trans-unit.target: 启用对 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata" /> 的现有块的就地更新。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata> is not associated with a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame> that is obtained through a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapDecoder>, the attempt to write metadata by using the in-place writer will fail.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata>不与关联<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame>获取通过<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapDecoder>，尝试编写使用就地编写器元数据将失败。

trans-unit.source: Successful write operations apply the metadata directly to the image stream by means of a decoder.
trans-unit.target: 成功的写入操作的元数据将直接应用于图像流通过解码器。

trans-unit.source: In-place metadata updates fail if an attempt is made to write metadata that a given bitmap format does not support.
trans-unit.target: 如果尝试写入给定的位图格式不支持的元数据，元数据的就地更新失败。

trans-unit.source: To perform in-place metadata edits, the bitmap must be decoded using either the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption.Default> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption.OnDemand> cache options.
trans-unit.target: 若要执行就地元数据的编辑，位图必须解码使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption.Default>或<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption.OnDemand>缓存选项。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption.OnLoad> does not guarantee access to the metadata stream needed for in-place metadata edits.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption.OnLoad> 不保证对所需的元数据的就地编辑元数据流访问权限。

trans-unit.source: This example shows how you can modify metadata within an image without having to re-encode the image.
trans-unit.target: 此示例演示如何修改图像中的元数据而无需重新对图像进行编码。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses an <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.InPlaceBitmapMetadataWriter> to write metadata into an image.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.InPlaceBitmapMetadataWriter>若要将元数据写入到的映像。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.InPlaceBitmapMetadataWriter" />, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 创建此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.InPlaceBitmapMetadataWriter" /> 的可修改克隆，从而深度复制此对象的值。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定（但可能不再解析），但不复制动画或其当前值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true." />
trans-unit.target: 即使源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性为 <see langword="true." />，所克隆的对象的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性也将为 <see langword="false" />

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether image metadata can be saved successfully.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否可以成功保存图像元数据。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if bitmap metadata can be written successfully; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果位图元数据可以成功写入，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.InPlaceBitmapMetadataWriter.TrySave%2A> method to determine whether metadata can be written successfully to a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)] image.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.InPlaceBitmapMetadataWriter.TrySave%2A>方法来确定是否可以成功地为写入元数据[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)]映像。
